mapper.update: update subsidy set subsidyFare=#{subsidyFare} where companyId=#{companyId} and subsidyStatus=0
update subsidy set subsidyFare=#{subsidyFare} where id=#{id}
update subsidy s,user u,discount d set s.subsidyFare=d.subsidy where s.userId=u.userId and u.cardTypeId=d.discountType and s.companyId=#{companyId} and s.subsidyStatus!=2

insert subsidyhistory (userId,companyId,subsidyFare,subsidyVersion,invalidDate,subsidyStatus) select userId,companyId,subsidyFare,subsidyVersion,invalidDate,subsidyStatus from subsidy where companyId=#{companyId}
mapper.select: select subsidyVersion,invalidDate from subsidy where companyId=#{companyId} and subsidyStatus!=0 limit 1
